home.greeting: Nice to meet you, I'm Eike.
home.introduction: I'm a Java backend engineer born 2001 in Tokyo with 4 years of profissional experience. I've had a strong interest in technology and gadgets since childhood, and my enthusiasm for exploring the latest tools and innovations continues to drive my work. Currently, I'm expanding my expertise by studying Golang, React, Next.js, Android native apps, Kotlin and AWS. I'm excited to leverage my diverse background and skills to create innovative solutions and tackle new projects.

a.label: 2020/10 - GFT Intern training camp
a.children: Intern at GFT, Java ecossistem training, TDD, QA, Angular
